synopsis.text: Little do they know that a treasure trove of inspiration awaits them, as young novelist Akutagawa Taketo and his friends find themselves stranded on a remote island nestled within the infamous Bermuda Triangle. This exotic and somewhat perilous setting fuels Taketo's extraordinary literary skills, which lean towards the risqu√© side, as he and his companions - including Narukara Fukune, Sonokoe Utae, and Meiki Raika - navigate through the island's twists and turns.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
